references.paper_title: Representation learning with contrastive predictive coding
references.reason: This paper introduces contrastive predictive coding, a foundational method used in the current paper for learning representations of time-series data.

references.paper_title: A latent variable model approach to pmi-based word embeddings
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical insights into the properties of representations learned through contrastive methods, which are leveraged to support theoretical claims in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Noise contrastive estimation and negative sampling for conditional models: Consistency and statistical efficiency
references.reason: This paper offers theoretical analysis of noise contrastive estimation, a crucial component of the contrastive learning methods used in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Understanding contrastive representation learning through alignment and uniformity on the hypersphere
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical understanding of contrastive learning, which is extended to time series in the current work.

references.paper_title: Contrastive learning as goal-conditioned reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper shows that contrastive learning can be used for goal-oriented tasks.  The current paper extends this to planning and inference.
